cards.name: The Fool
cards.customMeaningUp: Step boldly into the unknown, for chaos and wonder await. A leap of faith may bring either glory or catastrophe.

cards.name: The Magician
cards.customMeaningUp: You wield the power of the cosmos itself—use it wisely, or face the wrath of imbalance.

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.customMeaningUp: Secrets whisper in the shadows, and intuition holds the key to forbidden truths.

cards.name: The Empress
cards.customMeaningUp: Abundance flourishes around you, but beware—too much of a good thing can suffocate.

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.customMeaningUp: Order and control reign supreme, but beware of the iron fist of tyranny.

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.customMeaningUp: Tradition holds wisdom, but rigid rules may stifle the spirit. Dare to question the old ways.

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.customMeaningUp: Passion ignites like wildfire, but every choice has consequences that ripple through eternity.

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.customMeaningUp: Victory is within your grasp, but hold tight to the reins, or chaos will overtake you.

cards.name: Strength
cards.customMeaningUp: True power lies in gentleness; a beast tamed is mightier than one slain.

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.customMeaningUp: Solitude unveils hidden truths, but isolation can blur the path ahead.

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
cards.customMeaningUp: Fate spins its web; fortune smiles, but her favor is fleeting.

cards.name: Justice
cards.customMeaningUp: The scales will balance, but every truth revealed casts a shadow.

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.customMeaningUp: Sacrifice brings enlightenment, yet the cost may leave you dangling in uncertainty.

cards.name: Death
cards.customMeaningUp: An end brings a powerful new beginning, but transformation is never painless.

cards.name: Temperance
cards.customMeaningUp: Harmony flows where extremes are tempered, yet balance is a delicate dance.

cards.name: The Devil
cards.customMeaningUp: Temptation binds you, but every chain can be broken with courage and willpower.

cards.name: The Tower
cards.customMeaningUp: Destruction rains down, but from the rubble rises a stronger foundation.

cards.name: The Star
cards.customMeaningUp: Hope shines brightly, guiding you through the darkest night.

cards.name: The Moon
cards.customMeaningUp: Illusions weave a web of mystery; trust your instincts to see through the haze.

cards.name: The Sun
cards.customMeaningUp: Radiant joy lights your path, but even the brightest sun casts shadows.

cards.name: Judgement
cards.customMeaningUp: The past calls for reckoning; redemption is within reach if you dare to answer.

cards.name: The World
cards.customMeaningUp: Completion crowns your journey, but every ending births a new beginning.

cards.name: Ace of Wands
cards.customMeaningUp: A fiery spark ignites within you; seize the moment before it burns out.

cards.name: Two of Wands
cards.customMeaningUp: The world lies before you, waiting for your command. Choose your path with care.

cards.name: Three of Wands
cards.customMeaningUp: Your plans bear fruit; the horizon beckons with endless possibilities.

cards.name: Four of Wands
cards.customMeaningUp: Celebrate triumph, for this is a moment of pure joy and unity.

cards.name: Five of Wands
cards.customMeaningUp: Conflict brews, but from chaos emerges growth and understanding.

cards.name: Six of Wands
cards.customMeaningUp: Victory is yours, but the applause fades quickly.

cards.name: Seven of Wands
cards.customMeaningUp: Stand your ground; the battle may be fierce, but your resolve is unshakable.

cards.name: Eight of Wands
cards.customMeaningUp: Momentum accelerates; act swiftly, for hesitation could mean disaster.

cards.name: Nine of Wands
cards.customMeaningUp: Though weary, your perseverance will lead you to triumph.

cards.name: Ten of Wands
cards.customMeaningUp: The weight you carry is great, but the destination is in sight.

cards.name: Page of Wands
cards.customMeaningUp: Adventure calls; embrace it with the heart of a curious child.

cards.name: Knight of Wands
cards.customMeaningUp: Charge forward with fiery determination, but beware of reckless haste.

cards.name: Queen of Wands
cards.customMeaningUp: Your charisma burns bright; wield it wisely to inspire and lead.

cards.name: King of Wands
cards.customMeaningUp: Authority flows from your vision; command respect, but not through fear.

cards.name: Ace of Cups
cards.customMeaningUp: Your heart overflows with emotion; let love guide your path.

cards.name: Two of Cups
cards.customMeaningUp: A perfect union forms, but its strength lies in mutual trust and care.

cards.name: Three of Cups
cards.customMeaningUp: Rejoice in friendship and shared joy, for these are the bonds that sustain you.

cards.name: Four of Cups
cards.customMeaningUp: Opportunity knocks, but discontent clouds your vision.

cards.name: Five of Cups
cards.customMeaningUp: Loss weighs heavy, yet hope glimmers in what remains.

cards.name: Six of Cups
cards.customMeaningUp: Nostalgia offers comfort, but beware of dwelling too long in the past.

cards.name: Seven of Cups
cards.customMeaningUp: Dreams and illusions abound; choose wisely, for not all is as it seems.

cards.name: Eight of Cups
cards.customMeaningUp: Walk away from what no longer serves you; the unknown holds your salvation.

cards.name: Nine of Cups
cards.customMeaningUp: Contentment is yours, but complacency could be your undoing.

cards.name: Ten of Cups
cards.customMeaningUp: Harmony reigns supreme; cherish this moment of perfect happiness.

cards.name: Page of Cups
cards.customMeaningUp: An unexpected message stirs your heart; let creativity flow freely.

cards.name: Knight of Cups
cards.customMeaningUp: A romantic journey unfolds; follow your heart, but keep your head clear.

cards.name: Queen of Cups
cards.customMeaningUp: Empathy and intuition guide your actions; embrace your emotional depth.

cards.name: King of Cups
cards.customMeaningUp: Mastery of emotions grants you strength; lead with wisdom and compassion.

cards.name: Ace of Swords
cards.customMeaningUp: Clarity and truth pierce through confusion; wield your intellect boldly.

cards.name: Two of Swords
cards.customMeaningUp: A stalemate forces you to make a choice; trust in your inner balance.

cards.name: Three of Swords
cards.customMeaningUp: Heartache strikes deep, but healing begins in acceptance.

cards.name: Four of Swords
cards.customMeaningUp: Rest brings recovery; take time to regain your strength.

cards.name: Five of Swords
cards.customMeaningUp: Victory at what cost? Reflect on your actions and their consequences.

cards.name: Six of Swords
cards.customMeaningUp: Transition brings relief, though the journey ahead may be uncertain.

cards.name: Seven of Swords
cards.customMeaningUp: Cleverness or deceit? Use your wits, but remain true to your values.

cards.name: Eight of Swords
cards.customMeaningUp: Self-imposed restrictions bind you; freedom lies in shifting perspective.

cards.name: Nine of Swords
cards.customMeaningUp: Nightmares haunt you, but facing your fears leads to liberation.

cards.name: Ten of Swords
cards.customMeaningUp: A painful ending clears the way for new beginnings; surrender to the flow.

cards.name: Page of Swords
cards.customMeaningUp: Curiosity sparks your mind; approach new ideas with youthful enthusiasm.

cards.name: Knight of Swords
cards.customMeaningUp: Charge ahead with conviction, but beware of impulsiveness.

cards.name: Queen of Swords
cards.customMeaningUp: Wisdom and clarity guide your decisions; cut through illusions with precision.

cards.name: King of Swords
cards.customMeaningUp: Logic and authority define your leadership; rule with fairness and reason.

cards.name: Ace of Pentacles
cards.customMeaningUp: A seed of prosperity takes root; nurture it wisely for lasting abundance.

cards.name: Two of Pentacles
cards.customMeaningUp: Balance is key as you juggle multiple priorities; adaptability leads to success.

cards.name: Three of Pentacles
cards.customMeaningUp: Collaboration and skill come together to build something enduring.

cards.name: Four of Pentacles
cards.customMeaningUp: Clinging to security may block growth; let go to let abundance flow.

cards.name: Five of Pentacles
cards.customMeaningUp: Hardship weighs heavy, but hope glimmers in reaching out for help.

cards.name: Six of Pentacles
cards.customMeaningUp: Generosity creates harmony; giving and receiving are equally valuable.

cards.name: Seven of Pentacles
cards.customMeaningUp: Patience rewards effort; take time to assess and nurture your progress.

cards.name: Eight of Pentacles
cards.customMeaningUp: Dedication and hard work refine your craft; mastery is within reach.

cards.name: Nine of Pentacles
cards.customMeaningUp: Self-reliance and accomplishment shine; enjoy the fruits of your labor.

cards.name: Ten of Pentacles
cards.customMeaningUp: Legacy and fulfillment converge; cherish the stability you have built.

cards.name: Page of Pentacles
cards.customMeaningUp: Curiosity and ambition guide you toward new opportunities for growth.

cards.name: Knight of Pentacles
cards.customMeaningUp: Persistence and responsibility pave the way to long-term success.

cards.name: Queen of Pentacles
cards.customMeaningUp: Nurturing and practicality create a haven of comfort and abundance.

cards.name: King of Pentacles
cards.customMeaningUp: Wealth and stability crown your achievements; lead with generosity.
